conclusion: Initial analysis based on images and principles of motion and collision
Image 1 shows blocks of different colors and car A at lower right with a red line indicating direction towards red blocks
Car A is moving towards the cluster of red blocks based on its position and direction
Image 2 shows car A in contact with red blocks, which appear disturbed
Car's momentum is transferred to red blocks, causing them to move and reducing car's speed
Car collided with red blocks head-on with no significant deflection
Car is likely to stop at the point of impact with the red blocks
Car A will collide with the red blocks and eventually stop at or against them
